algorithm:
The new algorithm calculates the scores for the bins by dividing the sum of the ratio between the remaining capacity of each bin and the maximum capacity by the square root of the item size, multiplies the maximum value across all bins with the scores, subtracts the minimum value across all bins from the obtained scores, then normalizes the scores by dividing them by the sum of all scores.

Code:
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item, bins):
    """The new modified algorithm calculates the scores for the bins by dividing the sum of the ratio between the remaining capacity
    of each bin and the maximum capacity by the square root of the item size, multiplies the maximum value across all bins with the
    scores, subtracts the minimum value across all bins from the obtained scores, then normalizes the scores by dividing them by the
    sum of all scores."""
    
    # Calculate the sum of the ratio between the remaining capacity of each bin and the maximum capacity
    ratio_sum = np.sum(bins / np.max(bins))
    
    # Divide the ratio sum by the square root of the item size
    scores = ratio_sum / np.sqrt(item)
    
    # Multiply the maximum value across all bins with the scores
    scores *= np.max(scores)
    
    # Subtract the minimum value across all bins from the scores
    scores -= np.min(scores)
    
    # Normalize the scores by dividing them by the sum of all scores
    scores /= np.sum(scores)
    
    return scores
